languages.text: {n}Кассия протягивает руку к плечу Ахиллеаса и легким движением сбрасывает нечто невидимое с его плеча.{/n} "Ваши оттенки... покрылись слоем сажи и пепла, господин Скаландр. Я вижу под ними кровоточащие яркие краски. Позвольте... позвольте мне их успокоить?"

{n}Cassia reaches a hand out to Achilleas's shoulder and gingerly removes something unseen from it.{/n} "Your hues... are covered in a layer of soot and ash, Master Scalander. I can see the loud, bleeding colours underneath. May I... put them at ease for you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия протягивает руку к плечу Ахиллеаса и легким движением сбрасывает нечто невидимое с его плеча.{/n} "Ваши оттенки... покрылись слоем сажи и пепла, господин Скаландр. Я вижу под ними кровоточащие яркие краски. Позвольте... позвольте мне их успокоить?"

{n}Cassia reaches a hand out to Achilleas's shoulder and gingerly removes something unseen from it.{/n} "Your hues... are covered in a layer of soot and ash, Master Scalander. I can see the loud, bleeding colours underneath. May I... put them at ease for you?"

languages.text: {n}Cassia tend la main vers l'épaule d'Achilleas et en retire délicatement quelque chose d'invisible.{/n} « Maître Scalander, vos nuances... sont recouvertes d'une couche de suie et de cendres. Je peux voir les couleurs vives qui saignent en dessous. Puis-je les... soulager ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia reaches a hand out to Achilleas's shoulder and gingerly removes something unseen from it.{/n} "Your hues... are covered in a layer of soot and ash, Master Scalander. I can see the loud, bleeding colours underneath. May I... put them at ease for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia tend la main vers l'épaule d'Achilleas et en retire délicatement quelque chose d'invisible.{/n} « Maître Scalander, vos nuances... sont recouvertes d'une couche de suie et de cendres. Je peux voir les couleurs vives qui saignent en dessous. Puis-je les... soulager ? »

languages.text: {n}卡西娅把手放在阿吉里亚斯的肩膀上，动作小心翼翼，仿佛从他肩膀上摘下了某些看不见的东西。{/n}“你的色彩上……蒙着一层烟灰，斯卡兰德大师，我能看到下面那鲜艳的血色。我能……帮你驱散它们吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia reaches a hand out to Achilleas's shoulder and gingerly removes something unseen from it.{/n} "Your hues... are covered in a layer of soot and ash, Master Scalander. I can see the loud, bleeding colours underneath. May I... put them at ease for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅把手放在阿吉里亚斯的肩膀上，动作小心翼翼，仿佛从他肩膀上摘下了某些看不见的东西。{/n}“你的色彩上……蒙着一层烟灰，斯卡兰德大师，我能看到下面那鲜艳的血色。我能……帮你驱散它们吗？”

languages.text: {n}Cassia streckt die Hand nach Achilleas' Schulter aus und entfernt vorsichtig etwas Unsichtbares davon.{/n} "Eure Farbtöne ... sind mit einer Schicht Ruß und Asche bedeckt, Meister Scalander. Ich kann die lauten, blutenden Farben darunter sehen. Darf ich ... sie für Euch beruhigen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia reaches a hand out to Achilleas's shoulder and gingerly removes something unseen from it.{/n} "Your hues... are covered in a layer of soot and ash, Master Scalander. I can see the loud, bleeding colours underneath. May I... put them at ease for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia streckt die Hand nach Achilleas' Schulter aus und entfernt vorsichtig etwas Unsichtbares davon.{/n} "Eure Farbtöne ... sind mit einer Schicht Ruß und Asche bedeckt, Meister Scalander. Ich kann die lauten, blutenden Farben darunter sehen. Darf ich ... sie für Euch beruhigen?"

languages.text: {n}Cassia lleva una mano al hombro de Achilleas y retira algo desapercibido con cuidado.{/n} «Sus tonos... están cubiertos de una capa de hollín y ceniza, señor Scalander. Veo colores sangrientos y ruidosos debajo. ¿Le importa... si se los calmo?».
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia reaches a hand out to Achilleas's shoulder and gingerly removes something unseen from it.{/n} "Your hues... are covered in a layer of soot and ash, Master Scalander. I can see the loud, bleeding colours underneath. May I... put them at ease for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia lleva una mano al hombro de Achilleas y retira algo desapercibido con cuidado.{/n}Sus tonos... están cubiertos de una capa de hollín y ceniza, señor Scalander. Veo colores sangrientos y ruidosos debajo. ¿Le importa... si se los calmo?».

languages.text: {n}カシアはアキレアスの肩に手をかざし、目に見えない何かを慎重に取り払った。{/n}「あなたの色は…すすと灰が層になって覆っています、スカランダー殿。その下に血にまみれた大量の色が見える。あなたのために…彼らを休ませてもいいですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia reaches a hand out to Achilleas's shoulder and gingerly removes something unseen from it.{/n} "Your hues... are covered in a layer of soot and ash, Master Scalander. I can see the loud, bleeding colours underneath. May I... put them at ease for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアはアキレアスの肩に手をかざし、目に見えない何かを慎重に取り払った。{/n}「あなたの色は…すすと灰が層になって覆っています、スカランダー殿。その下に血にまみれた大量の色が見える。あなたのために…彼らを休ませてもいいですか？」

languages.text: {n}Cassia, Achilleas'ın omzuna uzanıp göremediğin bir şeyi dikkatlice alıyor.{/n} "Üstat Scalander... Tonlarınız is ve külle kaplanmış. Altta yatan o parlak, kanayan renkleri görebiliyorum. Dilerseniz... Sizi rahata erdireyim mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia reaches a hand out to Achilleas's shoulder and gingerly removes something unseen from it.{/n} "Your hues... are covered in a layer of soot and ash, Master Scalander. I can see the loud, bleeding colours underneath. May I... put them at ease for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia, Achilleas'ın omzuna uzanıp göremediğin bir şeyi dikkatlice alıyor.{/n} "Üstat Scalander... Tonlarınız is ve külle kaplanmış. Altta yatan o parlak, kanayan renkleri görebiliyorum. Dilerseniz... Sizi rahata erdireyim mi?"
